Blog.post: Hey..sup again..wanna talk bout some of my emcee stuff..ook?i wanna say that i have been doing underground emcee stuff since i was sec 1 when i first met lil kid..i kinda dont know anithing bout emcee till kid bust out his 1st rhymes on me..i was like.."Ehat the fuck?..what am i suppose to punch back on him??"that night kept my head spinin..as i was thinkin..i am representin hiphop but without an element?so..went i went back..i started tryin ma flow n write lame rhymes that pple would prolly say.."this guy is a noob"..i kept on improving on my rhymes..then..i met byf n byc..redboy..he asked me out for a battle n i was like chokin all the way when i battled him..i went home..thinkin bout punchlines and how I can improve on it..so..at last..i kinda got the basic of emcee..tried to battle ma ex homies..i won some of them..i was quite happy..i went step by step..from rhymes to punchlines..it keeps me thinkin bout my 1st rhyme book..till ma tuition teacher came to my house then ransacked ma room..caught some pack of cigrattes n ma rhyme book which is full of explicit words or dirty words..i kept it low the then..i stopped rappin fer bout 2 months..but..i aint wanna stop till i master it..so..that night..i went to popular to buy a exercise book to start ma rhymes back..n there it goes..with ma flows..yeah..i made my fist solo song which is titled "My Anthem"..then..came off with diss tracks n ma life tracks..bout 1 week later..i went cycling down the block and ended resting at 638RC..yeah..its a place where people use to chill arnd..do their thangs n stuff..den..i didnt realised that tengku amirrudin was there though i tought he was a gangsta but he came with his flows n styles..when imma bout to go home..he called me and ask me weather i am Duh iLg..which is my nick to many pple..hmm..where i got that nick from?..ook..ma first time to tis gig..n i met this gurl by the name of suhailah aka Lil'B..hmm..B?..yeah..it stands fer bitch..she made that name..mind if pple would call her a bitch..so..on that night..ma hair looks like a full time nerd..so..she called me The ILG..which stands for innocent looking guy but i do somke infront of her..then..i changed my name to innocent little guy..yeah..dats where pple go around callin me G..or iLg..back to the 638 thing..ook..then..i freestyled with him..i won him..they were from 40 ounce n MIC Family..then..he asked me out to be a part of his click..then..i said ook without thinkin bout the things that i must go through..yeah..on that night..he asked me to write my rhymes bout my crush..so i did..n then..the next day..i went about showing him ma rhymes..ook..at last..we went to make out ep..yeah..kinda great till i freestyled with him...and had a beef with him..since then..i went solo on ma track..n i met supakid on da net..he wanted to pull me into zero fam n fordafite..but now..i think twice b4 anythin happen...yeah..so..that day..i met him..then freestyled with him..he like ma flows tho i tought it was kinda lame..he begged me to enter..i said..wait..n now..this guy by the name of syerzan wants to make a duo with me when he fuckin talk bad bout me..sorries just dont come like dat...yeah..now..imma goin solo on ma track..hmm..lets see the future about how imma goin on rite ?aite..till here then..ill keep it updated aite..im out!

yeah..juz now..i said that i wanna go to his house..now..i am back..got a lot of punishments...he forced me to admit that i have been smoking otherwise..he'll throw my bicycle or sell it at the yahoo auction, which i know that is gonna be very cheap as bids start from $1..sounds funny huh ?but its true..yeah..now..wad am i gonna do?..wait fer ma mum to come home..den there it goes...sbeg her to take ma bike back from him n then..tell her that i have been smoking all this time..haiz..wonder if she would let me take back my bicycle as that day..i went out at the middle of the night without permission..as if like i am some sort of small kid!!duh!!haiz..wad now?..hmm..in ma room..trynna smoke but dont wish to as if i get caught again...there ma bike goes..ma $860 bike..fly!..fly in da air..first time..heard a bike got wings that can fly..hmm..he asked me alot of questions like he's somekind of tha cops?..cops go chase fer me..but eventually...they cant get me as i am Duh-iLg..thats me..outta here..boring!!!

yeah..it's my first day using this thing..today..i really dont have the mood because of some reasons thats going on between me and my tuition teacher..Fuck man!..why does he control me??Fuckin confiscate my bicycle and now he says that he wanna sell it???..bitch!..if he would sell it..i will make sure he sells his ass for no price!..can u pple pls not control me???..it really makes me sick when pple try to control me..Now..i dont have any freedom..feels like a dog being pulled around..yeah..u can send me somewhere else if you dont like me but dont you ever treat me like a dog!!!bitch up?..if i were to complaint this to my dad..i wonder what would my dad do to him..man..dis is kinda lame!!..now..i just have to get ready to be beaten..gettin ready to proceed to his house..fuck this shit!!..can u imagine pple imagine..1 box of cigarettes that contains 20 sticks or less..20 strokes of "his" cane..lame huh?..haiz. . .im out of this..holla

heya..its 9.35 am in the morning..i just woke up from ma sleep..hmm..yeah..yesterday was a bad day fer me as i got this so called "migrane"..DANG!..it hurts u noe..it hurts my neck..my whole head..i was at my tuition teacher's house..preparin to go to abg hussien's house..there is a class there..class ugama i mean..yeah..so..when imma bout to go there..this bloody head hurts..i was shoutin n shoutin like a mad person..i cant adapt in this type of situation where by my head hurts like FUCK!!..soon..my mum came to abg star's house..fetched me n she wanted to bring me to the doctor..i rejected..coz i was scared that the doctor would send me to the hospital..haha..yeah..so..ma mum brought me home..den..she so called rub the cold water on me..n there it goes..i went to sleep..yeah..i could sleep tight..donno y..n now..i am awaked..haiz!!...damn hungry..aite2..gtg..bye!..hehe

haiz..kinda borin at home..just finished watching one leg kicking..fun huh that show?..yeah...later..imma going to ma tuition teachers crib to watch tha finals for euro 2004?..ya pple watchin?..man..but imma got to say..both teams are kinda wack..so..i dont support anyone of them..just watch..so i get ma brains updated about the scores..at noon just now..i went to vista point's aquarium to buy some stuff for my fich..can u believe it ??for 3 weeks..ma luohan survived without food n oxygen?..cool..but its kinda let my heart n feelings on risk..i took 2 hours fixing everything up..wow..now..i feel happier..as i dont have to worry bout it anymore..tommorow's youth day..its a holiday!!..i dont have to go to school!!..man..i can sleep till i am happy..hehe..so..wad else that i wanna say?..ook..thats all aite?..halla..im out!
